data.eml:eml: Population research on small rodents (Rodentia) and screws (Soridae) in Lierne Municipaility – Norway, 1988 – 2017 based on systematic catches with ordinary mouse traps in traplines

Rodents from Lierne in Steinkjer, population time series. For non-commercial use, CC-BY-NC-4.0. Please contact data owner Ole Jakob Sørensen for any other use.

This dataset is archived in Zenodo at: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1295160[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.1295160.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1295160)
